instant_validation_1.answer: It made it a little worse (-1)

instant_validation_comment_1.answer: I personally don't like instant form feedback. If I type in an email address, I know it's invalid until I am done, and I don't need the form to tell me! This triggers me a bit. For all other fields, I didn't mind it, but also didn't see any benefits.

minimap_1.answer: It made no difference / I didn't notice it (0)

minimap_comment_1.answer: First, I didn't see it, then I didn't care about it because I went through the form top to bottom.

number_chunking_comment_1.answer: I hate it when forms don't do that!

error_navigation_comment_1.answer: Not having to look for the invalid field came in very handy. Although validating the last name to only contain letters is a bit of a problem if you have a hyphen in your name ;)
